title: Riot Player Support
body: How do I get in contact with the Head of Riot Games Player Support?

replies.body: I am not after them for help with a request or problem

Then I'm afraid I don't know how to help you. If it's something they'd talk to you about support could probably help you out, otherwise I don't know. You could try pming one of the Rioters on reddit and see fi they can help you.
See that's the problem every time I have, they tell me they are not going to or it's Impossible to talk to them because 'They do not do tickets'

Why do you specifically need to speak to that exact person, I'm sure any of the Player Support team are more than capable of handling your request.

If it were something that needed to be forwarded on to someone higher up it would be.

Because the heads are in charge of organisation and keeping everything running smoothly, they themselves do not respond to tickets, and could very well be unequipped to do so. There shouldn't be any issue you have that can't be solved by player support. The head will not be able to help you with anything.
If you have an inquiry for Riot Games Player Support, you can [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can forward it to a specific team if necessary.
